timeline.bodyText:
In BrokerService we are setting this field to null.
We could run into some NPE anyway in the future.
It is better to assign the result of getInterceptor to a local variable and then deference it safely, without calling twice this getter
timeline.author: eolivelli

replies.bodyText: @eolivelli Thanks for your feedback. I will use the a local variable to avoid calling twice of getInterceptor.
replies.author: hangc0276

timeline.message: use local variable to avoid calling getInterceptor twice
